attributes.action: Introduce FREE NHS Prescription charges for Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears that the British tax payer are to be forced to pay £50 Million Pounds so that the Scots can have free NHS prescriptions.
The logic behind this cannot be justified, this is an "Abuse" of the British taxpayer.
This must be changed or equalised so that all of the UK have free NHS prescriptions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
